description:
Everything you loved about mini golf and much more! Advanced riddles and holes to complete are waiting for you. Time to get back to your favorite Pocket Mini Golf so relax and play!

In the new expansion you will notice much more colorful levels thanks to the completely new graphic design. Now you will absolutely enjoy a mild breeze of freshness!

FEATURES:

- Even more addictive gameplay.
- 40 brand-new, unique, creative levels.
- New challenges that will get you hooked on this game again.
- Local multiplayer for up to 4 players on one console.
- New textures, enhanced graphics, UI design and enjoyable music.
name: Fairway
